newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia tin up 11 cents to 14.70 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia tin up 11 cents to 14.70 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price rose 11 cents to 14.70 ringgit ($5.92) a kg on strong buying from European, Japanese and local interests, traders said.
"There was good demand because yesterday's price was cheap, compared to the LME (London Metal Exchange)," said a trader.
The local market closed unchanged on Monday, despite the LME's $65 surge on Friday. Traders said the marginal $5.00 fall in the London price on Monday did not affect local sentiment.
Final turnover was 130 tonnes compared to 86 on Monday. The local price was at a premium of $35 against London, compared to a previous discount of $15.
